public class EdgeCollisionDetector
extends CollisionDetector
A CollisionDetector that detects collisions between Sprites and the edges of the CollisionArena in which they reside.

See Also:
CollisionDetector, Sprite, SimpleAnimationTest, BumpAnimationTest, TwoDrinkersAnimationTest
